article_title: Krugman Recants On Healthcare; The Left Is Apoplectic

article_metadata.description: In an obvious attempt to save Hillary (who is defending Obama policies tooth and nail) and Obamacare to boot, Paul Krugman of the New York Times has reversed course.
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
